'''1.7.10 Build 19'''<ref>{{link |url=http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog|title=MinecraftEdu Changelog|date=|website=|author=}}([https://web.archive.org/web/20170207182304/http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog Archive])</ref> is the nineteenth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released on May 29, 2015. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]].

== Additions ==
* Golems are now affected by the monsters setting.

== Changes ==
* Teacher menu and some other menus appearances redone.

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Exporting a world to zip not working properly.
* Huge lag when using creative inventory search in other than English language.
* Students being able to use {{cmd|msg}} when muted.
